Elazig Fırat University Technology R&D Entrepreneurship Student Society (FÜTAG) was established in 2009 at Fırat University to students in engineering and was established to teach and apply management principles. Various projects and prepare students for business life and realize their potential He continues to do his best to ensure that they arrive.

\t\tOur aim as a unit is to organize Teamwork by improving the communication skills of our members through activities and trainings. To support the creation of new products and ideas with the method.\n\n\t\tImplementation of ideas We are aware that they reach their true values with practice and practice. Entrepreneurship and Innovation unit In order to ensure that our teammates are included in the entrepreneurship ecosystem, We aim to support their ideas and bring them to the production stage.

\t\tThe purpose of our unit; our community needs to carry out advertising activities and to contribute to our promotion. Introducing our community In addition to this, we are working on social media management and photography.\n\n \t\tAs a unit, we will promote our community on social media in the future. As Software Unit, our aim is to help community to grow by doing design and architecture of software products that needed.

		Knowing the importance of adapting to the digital transformation process, we continue to work and aim to produce innovative products for the community.

		We also conduct trainings about the popular technologies and computer science.

\t\tAs a unit; we are working to ensure that every individual around us, children, young and old, has a happier and more peaceful life.It is the duty of all of us to provide a safer living space for all living things with which we share the same nature.\n\n\t\tTogether, we aim to make our environment and our future more beautiful, happy and peaceful.

\t\tOur aim as a unit is eager to produce and develop We design projects with our teammates and design these projects in the desired area. is to support.\n\n\t\tBe it technical or social projects, and adapting to the social world, while developing these projects, Developing our talents is our primary goal.

\t\tThe purpose of our unit; National and international to undertake the university representation for organizations and for the events we organize to contact authorized persons. To provide external connections on behalf of our community In addition to this, we also work on sponsorship and advertising.\n\n\t\tAs a unit, In the future, we will organize our group in the same category with the leading communities of our country. We aim to see and represent our university in the best possible way.

FÜTAG

 EXPRESS CONSENT DECLARATION UNDER THE LAW ON THE PROTECTION OF PERSONAL DATA

 Within the scope of the Law on the Protection of Personal Data submitted to your information by FÜTAG in accordance with the relevant provisions of the Law on the Protection of Personal Data No. 6698 ("KVK Law"). ; 

By FÜTAG as the data controller of personal data or by data processors authorized by taking the necessary security measures; FÜTAG's ability to provide its products and services to its users under the best conditions, to provide products or services in a reliable and uninterrupted manner, to maximize user satisfaction, to carry out promotion, marketing, advertising and campaign activities of different products and services, Personal data that is directly or indirectly related to the purpose of informing about blog posts and developments; It can be processed in accordance with the general principles expressed in Article 4 of the Law on the Protection of Personal Data No. 6698 ("KVK Law"), especially the principle of keeping them for the period required by the legislation or for the purpose for which they are processed; can be obtained, recorded, stored securely in physical or electronic environment for an appropriate period of time for processing, preserved, changed, rearranged, disclosed and transferred in accordance with the legislation, taken over, classified, processed or prevented from using the data; I accept and declare that I have been informed by FÜTAG regarding the above-mentioned issues and that I have given my express consent within the framework of the KVK Law.

Also, I declare that the personal data I have shared with FÜTAG is correct and up-to-date I accept and declare that if there is a change in this information, I will notify FÜTAG about the changes.

I expressly consent to the processing of my personal data, including my personal data of special nature defined in the KVK Law, to use and share it limited to the purpose of processing within the scope of the relevant process, and to keep it for the required period of time, and that I have been informed about this matter; I accept that I have read and understood this text, the FUTAG Regulation on the Protection and Processing of Personal Data and the Clarification Text.
